page.title: 06RELIGION
page.content: (ST.WULSTANS) FR. J REES BUILT ST. WULSTANS CHURCH IN 1936.FR. A MCLAUGHLIN IS THE PRESENT PARISH PRIEST OF ST.WULSTANS CHURCH AND HAS HAD ALTERATIONS AND HAD THE CHURCH REDECORATED IN 1983 AND 1984. ( OUR LADY AND ST. HUBERTS CHURCH.) OUR LADY AND ST. HUBERTS CHURCH WAS BUILT IN 1859 WITH MONEY DONATED BY JAMES LOMAX.THE CHURCH WAS BUILT WITH LOCAL AND YORKSHIRE STONE. (ST.BARTHOLOMEWS) ST.BARTHOLOMEWS IS THE OLDEST CHURCH IN GT. HARWOOD.IT IS LOCALLY KNOWN AS THE PARISH CHURCH.IT WAS BUILT IN THE 15TH CENTURY AND IS STILL USED TODAY.
